===== Jaunty Jackalope Release Parties =====

* DustinKirkland will be at The Jackalope, 404 E 6th Street, from 5pm - 7pm on Friday, April 24, 2009, celebrating the latest release, enjoying a few beers, and demonstrating some of Jaunty's new features.
** http://blog.dustinkirkland.com/2009/04/pictures-from-jaunty-release-party-at.html

===== Intrepid Ibex Release Party =====

AustinLUG hosted a party 6:30pm on Thursday October 30; 625 East 10th Street in downtown Austin.  They had all the downloads there for distribution.  <nowiki>[[http://door64.com/event/n/6005|Door64 event entry]]</nowiki>

Check out the spring Hardy release party: <nowiki>[[HardyReleaseParty|event]]</nowiki> page for a picture and summary.
